title: Wooxy
body: I need riot to help me i had 15 fps in the game and started using wooxy for map and i got my 60  now i am curious could i get banned? i got my main account 7 years ago and dont want to get banned.

replies.body: Keep in mind that [**third party programs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) can sometimes be malicious or otherwise harm your computer. There's also the simple fact that since these are third party and not programs or files released by Riot, we have no way to troubleshoot them. [**Alter game files at your own risk**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), and I'd suggest staying away from them since they *could* get your account banned.
